section.title: CDK Plugins
section.para: Since October 2003 CDK features a plugin API: &applications.plugin.CDKPluginInterface;. All programs implementing this API can make use of CDK plugins, one plugin that can run in all CDK based programs. At this moment there are two programs that implement the plugin API, and thus two programs in which the plugins can be run: Jmol and JChemPaint.

section.title: Download and Install
section.para: Plugins can be downloaded from the CDK SF download webpage. There is no automatic download of plugins yet, as, for example, in jEdit.
Plugins can be installed in Jmol, by copying them to the directory ${HOME}/.jmol/plugins and for JChemPaint in ${HOME}/.jchempaint/plugins.
